mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_algorithm_contest_history (user_seq, contest_seq, problem_id, submit_id, submit_time, runtime, language_seq, source_url, created_time) values ( #{userSequence}, #{contestSequence}, #{problemId}, #{submitId}, #{submitTime}, #{runtime}, #{languageSequence}, #{sourceUrl}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_ALGORITHM_PROBLEM ORDER BY PROBLEM_ID

SELECT @rn:=@rn+1 AS rank, nickname, point FROM ( SELECT nickname, COUNT(1) AS point FROM (SELECT user_seq, problem_id FROM tb_algorithm_contest_history GROUP BY user_seq, problem_id) t, tb_user u WHERE t.user_seq = u.seq GROUP BY t.user_seq ORDER BY point DESC, nickname ASC ) t1, (SELECT @rn:=0) t2;
